headline: Is Leidos (LDOS) Stock Undervalued Right Now?
summary: Here at Zacks, our focus is on the proven Zacks Rank system, which emphasizes earnings estimates and estimate revisions to find great stocks. Nevertheless, we are always paying attention to the latest value, growth, and momentum trends to underscore strong picks.

headline: Is Leidos (LDOS) a Buy as Wall Street Analysts Look Optimistic?
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for Leidos (LDOS) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?

headline: Leidos Signs Agreement to Enhance AI Innovation in UK: Time to Buy the Stock?
summary: Investors interested in AI-driven defense stocks can buy LDOS, considering its discounted valuation. Its recent partnership with the University of Edinburgh instills further confidence.

headline: Leidos Announces $1.75 Million Gift to Drake State Community & Technical College
summary: RESTON, Va. /3BL/ - Leidos today announced a $1.75 million donation to Drake State Community & Technical College in Huntsville, Alabama, creating new learning opportunities for students and allowing...
